about.title: About me
about.paragraph-1: I'm a curious person who likes to understand how things work and build solutions with code.
about.paragraph-2: I'm interested in everything related to web development, and I enjoy learning new tools while working on ideas that excite me.
about.paragraph-3: No busco ser perfecto, solo mejorar un poco cada d√≠a...
